title: The Question Deluxe Edition
description:
This is the Deluxe Edition of Emery's album "The Question". This does not include the DVD extras but does have the extra tracks that weren't included in the initial release. This torrent includes all 12 original tracks as well as the 7 bonus tracks included with the Deluxe Edition. All tracks are MP3.
